sub_topic: Finding the perimeter of a regular polygon.
message_1: A regular hexagon has a side length of 7 cm. What is its perimeter?
message_2:
A regular hexagon has six equal sides. To find the perimeter, simply multiply the side length (7 cm) by the number of sides (6).

Perimeter = 7 cm Ã— 6 = 42 cm
